QM_30mm_scopes description: So you're 30mm scopes enthusiast? I may or may not have a stock of high quality scopes. Let's put it this way: you show me your skill with them and then we can talk about purchasing those from me
QM_30mm_scopes successMessageText: Always a pleasure to help fellow scopes enjoyers
